DOC.brief_summary: The Study is designed to collect information about adverse events that occur in children undergoing anesthesia in participating hospitals. Demographic information will be collected on all anesthestics. An analysis of each adverse event will be performed and entered into the database. From this information we will devise strategies to prevent these adverse events.
DOC.brief_title: The Pediatric Anesthesia Quality Improvement Project
DOC.criteria: All children undergoing anesthesia at participating hospitals Patients over 21 years of age
